docs.title: Capture Territory Game
docs.text:
A real-time multiplayer strategy game built with:

  • Node.js + Express
  • MongoDB
  • Socket.IO
  • React (Vite)

Players compete to capture territory on a 30×30 node map, manage resources, train armies, and battle others in real time.

docs.title: Features
docs.text:
• Real-time tile capture
  • Army training (infantry, archer, cavalry, siege)
  • Resource management
  • Email-based authentication
  • WebSocket-powered updates

docs.title: Who is this for?
docs.text:
• Contributors
  • Developers who want to run the project locally
  • Curious players 👀

docs.title: Getting Started
docs.text: This guide helps you understand the project structure and prerequisites.

docs.title: Prerequisites
docs.text:
Make sure you have:

  • Node.js (v18+ recommended)
  • MongoDB (local or Atlas)
  • Git
  • npm

docs.title: Project Structure
docs.text:
war-territory-game/
├── client/ # Frontend (React + Vite)
├── server/ # Backend (Node + Express)
├── docs/ # Documentation
└── mkdocs.yml

docs.title: Tech Stack
docs.text: Layer Technology Backend Node.js, Express Database MongoDB Real-time Socket.IO Frontend React + Vite Auth JWT + Email verification

docs.title: 3️⃣ Environment Variables (.env in /server)
docs.text:
PORT=5000
MONGO_URI=your-mongo-connection-string
JWT_SECRET=your-secret-key
EMAIL_USER=your-email
EMAIL_PASS=your-email-password
For more detail lookup this :

docs.title: 🎨 Frontend Setup
docs.text:
cd ../client
npm install
npm run dev

✨ Starts Vite Dev Server (default port)

docs.title: Gameplay Flow
docs.text:
• Player spawns with a base
  • Resources generate passively
  • Capture tiles to expand territory
  • Train armies using resources
  • Engage other players in real-time battles
